author: The Piano Guys
description:
“All Alone For Christmas” by Darlene Love piano cover from The Piano Guys.
Get this Song: https://lnk.to/AAFCTPG
 WE’RE ON TOUR: https://smarturl.it/the10tour 
Subscribe: https://bit.ly/2XH4GCF | Our NEWEST videos: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7j5iXGSdMwdfnzc8Faa-HJITq9hPEEdI&playnext=1&index=2

All Alone on Christmas," famously featured in Home Alone 2, brings back memories of holiday magic, snowy streets, and the heartfelt charm of Darlene Love's timeless voice. ✨

We couldn't resist giving this classic a little Piano Guys touch. With a sprinkle of festive fun and our signature sound, we hope this cover brings some warmth and cheer to your holiday season. Whether you're decking the halls, sipping hot cocoa, or just taking a break from the hustle and bustle, let this song remind you that even if you're feeling "all alone," the spirit of Christmas is always near. ❤️🎄

Leave a comment and let us know what Christmas song we should cover next! 

Learn about our beliefs here: http
title: All Alone For Christmas - Darlene Love (Piano Cover) The Piano Guys
